channel.title: Titus-X where the unique-itus begins and ends
channel.description:
[ul][font=Trebuchet Ms][center][size=5][u][b][img]http://i1083.photobucket.com/albums/j381/lKinglKobra/Titus-x-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1083.photobucket.com/albums/j381/lKinglKobra/Titus-x-banner2.gif[/img]
[/b][/u][/size] [list] [li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#about]About us[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#aim]History[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#extra]Extra Information[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#staff]Staff List[/iurl][/li] [/list]
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=introduction]1.0 - Introduction[/b][/size] Titus-X is the remains of Myth-Scape. Coonhunter and I personally will continue this development and make this the best server we can for everybody. The server shall have daily updates as we will be re-adding several features that were added that are now lost. We will also be be improving the client greatly. Myth-Scape was all about making unique content(for me at least) this will be as well. Do not expect the normal goals of "perfect combat" and "clipped firemaking" We want to broaden the horizons so unique content can be developed. At our digressions we may even release a little of the work :)
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=about]2.0 - About us[/b][/size] Myth-Scape was originally founded in/or around June of 2010. The server stayed open for about three months in which time it closed. In late November I was offered to help rebuild the server, it closed once more at the beginning of the new year. Now known as Titus-X we will continue this server and continue making it be what we want it to be. We have only two developers for this server: Coonhunter and Loveandpower. [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=aim]3.0 - Updates[/b][/size] Updates will start shortly.
1/11/12 - New client 0.4.3 has been developed. Features include screenshot system and a saving system. 1/11/12 - Going through the source and changing the names from Myth-Scape to Titus-X respectively. 1/11/12 - Started progress on re-adding the lost content. Some items will have to be rewritten most likely. 1/11/12 - Highscores are back up 1/11/12 - Looking for a site 1/11/12 - Deleted a couple of commands...cleaned the commands class in the process of redesigning it. 1/11/12 - Downloaded superassholes source going to see what I feel like ripping from it Updates from me: 1/11/12 - 1/12/12 Fixed a glitches in the crafting system Finished changing server over to the new name Fixed a some reported bugs Fixed a severe bug in minning. Fixed 'bank all' bug 1/12/12 - New Farming base added working out bugs still 1/12/12 - Base for flowers is done just gathering data 1/12/12 - Base for berries is done just gathering data 1/12/12 - Fixed an error with farming where patches were not wanting to respawn properly Updates 1/13/12 Disabled smelting and started re-writing the entire system Added in voting page Fixed more bugs throughout server. 1/13/12 - Fixed flower farming ...stupid me forgot to call everything 1/13/12 - Firemaking still being worked on..doesn't spawn the new object for some reason Being reviewed.by a couple of friends :p 1/13/12 - Added vote shop 1/13/12 - Gave coon the stuff for quick prayers(not sure how to do checkmarks so he will have to do that himself) 1/13/12 - Black(r) trim has been added. 1/13/12 - CLIPPED FIREMAKING Update 1/13/12 Converted relog voting rewards system to automatic rewards. Converted rewards system to now use points, Eddie added shop. Fixed server bugs Finished donation page. 1/13/12 - Dominion Tower base is added still trying to think of something unique to do with it ( maybe a skillers part? I don't know yet) 1/13/12 - Somebody suggested construction so going to look at supermans and get the general idea of what needs to be done. 1/13/12 - Itemonground packet is now handled(coonhunter did it ) 1/13/12 - Fixed a minor bug with firemaking that was messing up my clipping 1/13/12 - Started work on lunar spells(won't be completed for a couple of days) 1/13/12 - Gave Coon some smf themes to add ;) 1/13/12 - Our site domain has been made so fixing that 1/14/12 - like 70% lunar spells have been added...will implement more at a later time when some of our skills that go with them are added. 1/17/12 - Pest control worked on some more... we are ripping an interface I found on another client but we have to convert it so it won't be up until later.
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=extra]4.0 - Extra Information[/b][/size] Here is a bunch of random facts for now this will be expanded as the time goes by:
-Currently running a 2gb vps -Currently running SMF forums -Currently all skills except Mining and Smithing are functional -Currently pvp is bugged -Titus-X forums are now open for public use -Titux-X Chatroom is now up for public use
[size=2][b][anchor=staff]5.0 - Staff List[/b][/size]
Moderators: N/A:
[b]1/N/A[/b]
[b]RiiPiiNFtW/RiiPiiNFtW - RiiPiiNFtW[/b]
Developers:
[b]2/2[/b]
CoonHunter Loveandpower
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
---
More to come later
Images
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7R54U.png[/img]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-o2EnNBqdlk
[/center][/ul]

item.title: Titus-X where the unique-itus begins and ends
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Xx Weed Xx, post:114, topic:428938”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=531633.msg3890125#msg3890125 date=1326769761]

Just out of curiosity is this Myth-Scape with a new name?

& Do you want me to develop your new set of forums, properly this time. I knew MythScape wasn’t going to work so I saw no point in wasting my time. But reading the update logs I think this will be a success If you actually stick to it.

Jack lost ‘motivation’ after he earned over $900 and around 400M rsgp. He claims most of it was recalled on paypal so he really didn’t make anything. He refused to just make me lead dev and instead wanted to sell the server. From backups Eddie had of the server, and backups of the client I had. As well as donations from players we re-opened under a new name.

tl;dr - Yes, this is Myth-Scape under a new name since Jack only wanted money.
[/quote]

Alright, knew Jack was in the for the money tbh.[/quote]
I did as well, but shutting down a server and refusing to point someone as lead-dev, and instead trying to sell it. That in my opinion, is just completely uncalled for.

EDIT: Just a note for anybody considering. Try not to use cobrahost. They try to update their systems and fail quite frequently. As a result the server has dropped to past the 3rd page, or as a developer knows it, the point of no players.

Read full topic
item.source: Titus-X where the unique-itus begins and ends

item.title: Titus-X where the unique-itus begins and ends
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I used google and javascript to test.
Type into browser “javascript: (10 << 8) << 16” without the quotes and you will get the value for the offset for the lower left patch. Just now getting bitshifts (<< and >>). iirc it is x * 2^y for x << y.

Allotments
Fally + Catherby
config 504

Fally
NW is just value
SE is (value << 8) << 16
NW + SE is ((se << 8) + nw) << 16

Catherby
S is value << 8
N is (1 << 8) + value
N + S is (value << 8) + value

Will post more and such as I figure them out. Other two allotments should use that same patterns just config is 505 instead of 504. Will test tomorrow.

[quote=“sinisoul, post:111, topic:428938”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=531633.msg3890313#msg3890313 date=1326779510]

After reading this I realize how much I missed knowing in school after passing without the required math courses :’(

I’m teaching myself bitwise operands and it is hard, to say the least, once you start out. Getting easier, though…
[/quote]

Learn logs and it gets easier, newb.[/quote]
1 year ahead of me…

Read full topic

item.title: Titus-X where the unique-itus begins and ends
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Uhm… Odd. I think I got a different formula.
I got…
value stands for original value without any offset. so like 0, 1, 2 and such
(value * 256) << 16
So like in the nw you would have config 504 10 for fully grown potatoes.
And in se you would have 504 ((10 * 256) << 16)
And then there is for when there is two things growing… Like potatoes in nw and cabages in se. Working on that now.

Read full topic
item.source: Titus-X where the unique-itus begins and ends

Uhhhhhhhh the maximum would be 15 - 7 bits I believe.

item.title: Titus-X where the unique-itus begins and ends
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Too lazy to pull up my varbit dump. But yes for the most part, you are right AJ.

Varibit: 709, Config: 504, Shift: 8, Bit Offset: 15, Mask[7]: 11111111

Would be,

(value) << 8 & (1 << 7 - 1)

Not 1 << 15.

Purpose of varbit is to have multiple definitions on an action of a mob or entity that has a range of values.

Read full topic
item.source: Titus-X where the unique-itus begins and ends

item.title: Titus-X where the unique-itus begins and ends
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Alright. Allotment in the nw corner in the fally place is object id 8550. If you used that dump you can see the variable bit for 8550 is 708. If you look at varbit 708 you see Varibit: 708, Config: 504, Shift: 0, Bit Offset: 7, Mask[7]: 11111111 So it uses config 504 and the shift is 0. Now what I think I am getting wrong is how to implement the shift. But the total amount of values is up to 256 (the bit offset). Next allotment patch is 8551 and it is varbit 709. And this is what you see for varbit 709. Varibit: 709, Config: 504, Shift: 8, Bit Offset: 15, Mask[7]: 11111111 Now if you do 1 << 15 you get 32768. Pretty sure that is the offset cuz if you look at config 491 (varbit 607- like 619) and do that it works. But also the shift goes the same as the offset so that’s where I think I am wrong with allotments.

inb4sinicomesandcorrectsme

Read full topic
item.source: Titus-X where the unique-itus begins and ends

for some reason it isn’t working although I am 99.99% that is correct cuz it works for mysterious ruins.[/quote]that honestly made no sense to me :o
